long_description: This waterproof river guide chronicles the Green River from Labyrinth Canyon to Lees Ferry on the Colorado River. Design and cartography: Buzz Belknap; text: Loie Belknap Evans; geology text: R. J. Johnson. Softcover; 79 pages; color maps, illustrations and photographs. Westwater Books; copyright 2008. Guide covers the following areas: Labyrinth/Stillwater, Horsethief/Ruby, Westwater/Moab, Moab/Confluence, Cataract Canyon, Lake Powell and Glen Canyon. Detailed river maps note river miles, campsites, put-ins/take-outs, history/geology notes and other important paddling information. Special section details the fascinating geology and history of the area. An excellent companion on the water; simply blot and separate pages to dry.
short_description: This waterproof river guide chronicles the Green River from Labyrinth Canyon to Lees Ferry on the Colorado River.
